To the north lay the road that trails off into underground caverns along a fresh river to the northwest, secretly winding its way between the Sylvan woods and the Wyrden forest. A careful inspection of this humongous nest reveals four distinct areas with crude coal drawings delineating the sections. On the west side of the nest is an image of a disappearing river fading from sight and memory. On the north side, a large shadow in the shape of the Master Ravenwood blots out all light. On the east side is the simple phrase, 'Glory be to Glomdoring!', and on the south side, there is an image of a great black bird admonishing a group of cowered warriors. A dark hole of inky black in the center of the nest leads down through the hollowed tree.[36m Glowing glyphs hang in the air here. Near the top of the chamber, a nearly inscrutable difference in the depth of the shadows betrays an opening above, while a constant, subtle breeze allows hints at the exit. Look for KOMBU or MELANCHOLIC [22;32m3785h, 3763m, 4821e,[1;33m 7p,[22;32m 17600en,[1;33m 14713w[22;53m xkd- [33mNight's Shelter within the Great Ravenwood Tree.[1;31m ([22;32mShadowvale Arena.[1;31m) [37mT[31mh[32me[33mr[34me[35m i[36ms[37m a[31m m[32ma[33me[34ml[35ms[36mt[37mr[31mo[32mm[33m o[34mf[35m r[36ma[37mi[31mn[32mb[33mo[34mw[35m c[36mo[37ml[31mo[32mu[33mr[34ms[35m w[36mh[37mi[31mp[32mp[33mi[34mn[35mg[36m v[37mi[31mo[32ml[33me[34mn[35mt[36ml[37my[31m a[32mr[33mo[34mu[35mn[36md[37m.[22m Deep within this large Ravenwood a hollow chamber has been carved, providing protection and a means to climb to the top of the great tree. The room is encompassed in an inky blackness so thick that sight is utterly obscured, leaving only the other senses to give any indication of the surroundings. Near the top of the chamber, a nearly inscrutable difference in the depth of the shadows betrays an opening above, while a constant, subtle breeze allows hints at the exit. Mixed with the fresh scent of the Wyrden forest, the strong stench of blood and severed flesh fills the dark chamber, creating a pungent contrast to the stale scent of the dried out wood that defines the space. Large knots and gnarled wood provide ample footing from which to continue upward or to face a foe in battle[36m Covered in bone armour, a furry tarantula crouches here, ready to pounce on unsuspecting prey. The room is encompassed in an inky blackness so thick that sight is utterly obscured, leaving only the other senses to give any indication of the surroundings. Near the top of the chamber, a nearly inscrutable difference in the depth of the shadows betrays an opening above, while a constant, subtle breeze allows hints at the exit. Mixed with the fresh scent of the Wyrden forest, the strong stench of blood and severed flesh fills the dark chamber, creating a pungent contrast to the stale scent of the dried out wood that defines the space.
